definitions.title: n.pr.loc.
definitions.body: city (conquered by Assyria under Sargon ?) poss. = [[כַּנֶּה]] (q.v.) Ez Eze 27:23, LXX om. in Am 6:2, Xalannh Is 10:9; perh. = Kullani (Wkl:Gesch. Bab. 225) i.e. (Tomkins:PSBA Jan. 1883, 61) Kullanhou, near Aleppo, conquered by Tiglath-Pileser III in 738 (COT:ii, 195); or (Di) Kunulua (KG:217 KB:i, 107), SE. of Antioch (cf. Dr:Am 6:2).
